title: Development Roadmap
subtitle: Discover What's Coming Next
description: Follow our development progress and upcoming features. We've accomplished incredible milestones with 500+ commits and continue building the future of cultural symbol research.

coreStabilization.title: Core Platform Stabilization
coreStabilization.description: Complete authentication system, collections management, and admin dashboard with 500+ commits of development

performanceOptimization.title: Performance Optimization
performanceOptimization.description: Enhanced loading speeds, caching, and responsive design improvements

multilingualExpansion.title: Multilingual Expansion
multilingualExpansion.description: Support for Spanish, German, and Italian languages

advancedSearch.title: Advanced Search & Filtering
advancedSearch.description: AI-powered search with cultural and geographical filters

publicAPI.title: Public API Platform
publicAPI.description: RESTful API for researchers and third-party integrations

realTimeCollaboration.title: Real-time Collaboration
realTimeCollaboration.description: Live editing, comments, and collaborative research tools

aiPatternRecognition.title: AI Pattern Recognition
aiPatternRecognition.description: Advanced AI to automatically identify and categorize cultural patterns

mobileApp.title: Native Mobile Application
mobileApp.description: iOS and Android apps for field research and symbol discovery

milestone.title: Major Milestone Achieved!
milestone.description: Symbolica has reached over 500 commits representing a mature, stable platform with comprehensive features.
